info.task: navigate backwards to expanded accordion header
info.title: Navigate backwards to an expanded accordion header

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondAccordionHeaderAndHideFirstAccordionContent
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, and hides the content associated with the 'Personal Information' accordion header while leaving it expanded

user: With focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
